roleset.name: surplus, outide of what is required/expected

example.name: arg1
example.text: ALife is the best gift; the rest is extra.

roleset.note: EXTRA-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from extra.01-j)
If this is being used as a prefix, make sure it shouldn't be part of a larger concatenated rel (extra ordinary, etc.) (from extra.01-j)
